SEARCH
Package tetris.tetrominoes

Class TTetromino

java.lang.Object
tetris.tetrominoes.Tetromino
tetris.tetrominoes.TTetromino
public class TTetromino extends Tetromino
Represents the 'T' Tetromino (T-shape).

Characteristics:

  • Color: Magenta (Purple).
  • Grid: 3x3 matrix.
  • Rotations: 4 distinct visual states. Used for "T-Spins" in modern Tetris.

  • Constructor Details

    • TTetromino

      public TTetromino(int rotationIndex, int x, int y, int parentX, int parentY)
      Constructs a T Tetromino.
      Parameters:
      rotationIndex - Initial rotation (0-3).
      x - Logical grid X.
      y - Logical grid Y.
      parentX - Screen offset X.
      parentY - Screen offset Y.

    • getApparentWidth

      public int getApparentWidth()
      Returns the visual width. Rotation 0/2 (Horizontal): 3 blocks. Rotation 1/3 (Vertical): 2 blocks.
      Specified by:

    • createCopy

      public Tetromino createCopy()
      Description copied from class: Tetromino

      Specified by:
